if value is not None:
		data = system.db.execQuery("Exchange/Ignition RAG/Get Messages", {"chatId": value})
		return [{"message": row["message"], "role": row["role"]} for row in data]
	return []

config.script:
question = self.props.text
	chatId = self.view.custom.chatId
	
	if len(question) > 0 and event.key == "Enter":
		try:
			self.getSibling("Thinking Label").position.display = True
			
			# Start a new chat
			if chatId is None:
				chatId = exchange.ignitionRAG.utils.getId()
				self.view.custom.chatId = chatId
				chatTitle = exchange.ignitionRAG.chat.generateChatTitle(question)
				userId = self.session.props.auth.user.id if self.session.props.auth.user.id else ""
				
				params = {
					"chatId": chatId,
					"chatTitle": chatTitle,
					"userId": userId
				}
				system.db.execUpdate("Exchange/Ignition RAG/Insert Chat", params)
				system.perspective.sendMessage("ignition-rag-refresh-chat-repeater", {})
				system.perspective.sendMessage("ignition-rag-select-chat", {"chatId": chatId})
				system.perspective.navigate("/chat/%s" % chatId)
			
			# Insert the user message
			messageId = exchange.ignitionRAG.utils.getId()
			params = {
				"messageId": messageId,
				"chatId": chatId,
				"message": question,
				"role": "user"
			}
			system.db.execUpdate("Exchange/Ignition RAG/Insert Message", params)
			self.getSibling("Chat History").refreshBinding("props.instances")
			self.props.text = ""
			
			# Get the answer
			answer = exchange.ignitionRAG.rag.generateAnswer(question)
			
			# Insert the ansewr in the DB
			messageId = exchange.ignitionRAG.utils.getId()
			params = {
				"messageId": messageId,
				"chatId": chatId,
				"message": answer,
				"role": "system"
			}
			system.db.execUpdate("Exchange/Ignition RAG/Insert Message", params)
			self.getSibling("Chat History").refreshBinding("props.instances")
			
			self.getSibling("Thinking Label").position.display = False
		except Exception as e:
			system.perspective.openPopup("ignition-rag-message", "Exchange/Ignition RAG/Popups/Message", {"message": "Error: %s" % str(e)})
			self.props.text = ""
